welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Quivican, Cuba! Get ready to experience the charming streets, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Quivican has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal handles domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for charter flights to and from the United States.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This modern terminal is used for international flights from major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is used for regional flights within Cuba.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic and charter flights.
